This is about right.  tho i may go so far as to say audio is at a 6 up until the last 45 minutes. If you're playing it over plex, you'll need to do the 2nd level of audio boost to make it really shine. 

Also, I can't tell if someone let the people who worked on the new re-boot of Star Trek do the visual effect for Looper, but there is a fuckton of blue lens flaring.  I'm blaming that on the film, not the rip.  but whatever, it's noticeable.
